Title: Relates to persons who may become a voluntary administrator
Summary: Relates to persons who may become a voluntary administrator; includes fiduciaries of a deceased distributee, or a competent adult who is not a distributee upon the filed consent of all competent distributees as persons who can become a voluntary administrator prior to the chief fiscal officer of the county becoming such.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the surrogate's court procedure act, in relation to persons who may become a voluntary administrator
